###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlHeader_GetItemParam

###Description###
Retrieves the param value of the item

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiHeader.au3>
_GUICtrlHeader_GetItemParam($hWnd, $iIndex)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to control
$iIndex
	Zero based item index
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: Item param value

###Remarks###
None.
